text: National Association Grounds was a baseball grounds in Cleveland, Ohio. It was home to the Cleveland Forest Citys of the National Association in 1871 and 1872, so it is considered a major league ballpark by those who count the National Association as a major league. == References == *Retrosheet. "Park Directory". Retrieved 2006-09-04. title: National Association Grounds
